modName: Ancano Follower - High Elf wizard companion
summary: adds a follower who has same face as Ancano at breezehome\'s yard. His voice is diffrent from original Ancano, but you can make him a follower or a partner.
descriptionHtml:
This is not lore friendly.
\"Ancano Follower\" adds a NPC \"Ancano the Thalmor\"
He can be your follower or partner.

[Require]
Skyrim.exe version 1.4.27 or newer.
You can hire him in 1.4.22 or older, but textures and meshes dosen\'t work.

After you introduced this mod into your game, Skyrim has two Ancanos[Vanilla\'s and Ancano the Thalmor].
You might feel kinda weird, but I aimed this mod for one of my friends who loves Ancano.
So that the purpose of Ancano follower is to make her role playing more immersive.
So I think it\'s Okay.
After making this mod, I wanted to share it someone like her.
You can find him at breezehome\'s yard.

There are two types of Ancano follower, essential or protected
If you would like to take him to ah..  \"a quest\" which requires non-essential NPC, please choose protected version *grin*

[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12900-1-1340341411.jpg[/img]
Ancano the Thalmor:
level min 15 to  max 120
He is a elemental wizard specialized fire and shock.
He has same skills, spells and perks as original Ancano.
Be careful, he uses fireballs a lot when his magicka is enough.
I think he is powerful enough, so I didn\'t change his status except his maximum level.
You can make him a follower or marriage with him.

English Voice Pack is available as Optional File 
[youtube]3n2gSQ_8SXw[/youtube]
Jpanese version [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19216][img]http://www.thenexusforums.com/flags/jp.gif[/img][/url]

[Notice and known issues]
>>Ancano the Thalmor attacks your aother follower, when you command another one to go home nearby Ancano the Thalmor, when Ancano dose not follow you. 
>>After your marriage with him, I recommend you to invite him to your house. Because his home is Breezehome\'s yard. 
>>His voice is Human Maleeventonedaccented. I had to choose from several voices that allows him to be a follower or partner. I think the Human voice is better than Darkelf, Orcs or Khajiit for Elven.

[Recommended mods]
I think you can use any mods that improve and enhance follower system.
I used only vanilla stuff to make Ancano Follower.
It is really simple follower mod to make a friend enjoy.

[Log]
-1.3
fixed foloder name and texture works correctly
added English voice pack to Optional file

-1.2
fixed skin color

-1.0 and 1.1
Initial upload and fixed his face
author: Sifka
